# IllIllI

warden

OG Warden

Available for Hire

## Highlights

  * [Ranked #10 on Code4rena all-time leaderboard](https://code4rena.com/leaderboard)

As of June 2023, I'm currently ranked #10 on Code4rena's all-time leaderboard,
having earned over $250k in awards.

  * [Ranked #1 on the Sherlock leaderboard](https://audits.sherlock.xyz/leaderboard)

As of June 2023, I'm currently ranked #1 on Sherlock's leaderboard, having
earned 538 points and over $190k in awards.

  * [#1 bot race bot](https://www.botracer.xyz/leaderboard)

Top bot in most bot races (e.g.
https://gist.github.com/liveactionllama/27513952718ec3cbcf9de0fda7fef49c)

## IllIllI's Activity

The Activity Stream is currently in beta. [Share feedback here](/help).

## Available for hire

I'm available for in-depth audits, or much less expensive bot-race-style
audits

[Get a quote](https://code4rena.typeform.com/solo-
audit#warden=IllIllI&source=IllIllI-profile)
